7 const double loopRate = 50.0;
8 
9 void catchUnixSignals(
10  const std::vector<int>& quitSignals,
11  const std::vector<int>& ignoreSignals = std::vector<int>())
12 {
13 
14  auto handler = [](int sig) -> void
15  {
16  printf("\nquit the application (user request signal = %d).\n", sig);
17  QCoreApplication::quit();
18  };
19 
20  // all these signals will be ignored.
21  for (int sig : ignoreSignals)
22  signal(sig, SIG_IGN);
23 
24  // each of these signals calls the handler (quits the QCoreApplication).
25  for (int sig : quitSignals)
26  signal(sig, handler);
27 }
28 
29 int main(int argc, char** argv)
30 {
31 
32  ros::init(argc, argv, "car_dashboard");
33  ros::NodeHandle nh;
34  QApplication a(argc, argv);
35  catchUnixSignals({SIGQUIT, SIGINT, SIGTERM, SIGHUP});
36  Dashboard w(&nh);
37  w.show();
38  return a.exec();
39 }
